file_insights.changes: Added export statement for workloadApi module
file_insights.impact: Exposes workloadApi to consumers importing from the api index barrel export
file_insights.significance: Enables usage of workloadApi throughout the frontend codebase via centralized API export pattern

patterns_discovered.description: Central index.ts file exports all API modules, providing a single import point for consuming code
patterns_discovered.observed_in: api/index.ts aggregating exports from contacts, files, audit, inspections, and workload modules
patterns_discovered.benefit: Simplifies imports and maintains consistent API module discovery pattern

patterns_discovered.description: Each API domain (contacts, files, audit, inspections, workload) has its own dedicated file
patterns_discovered.observed_in: Structure of ./api directory with domain-specific exports
patterns_discovered.benefit: Organizes API calls by domain, improving maintainability and code discoverability

gotchas_discovered.description: New API modules must be explicitly added to the barrel export or they won't be accessible to consumers
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Could automate this via build tooling or enforce through linting rules

approach_outcome.description: Successfully exported workloadApi from the central API index file
approach_outcome.execution_quality: Clean single-line export addition following established pattern
approach_outcome.deployment_readiness: Ready - minimal, focused change with low risk of regressions

recommendations.suggestion: Consider automating barrel export generation to prevent missing exports when new API modules are added
recommendations.rationale: Reduces manual work and eliminates risk of forgetting to update index.ts when new APIs are created

recommendations.suggestion: Document the API module structure and requirement to update barrel exports
recommendations.rationale: Helps new developers understand the pattern and prevents forgotten exports in future PRs
